metadata.description: Enabled Auto Shutdown.  !!!If Enabled, AutoShutdownEmail MUST be added!!!!
Set this parameter to Personal if you would like to enable Persistent Desktop experience. Defaults to false.
Set the type of assignment for a Personal hostpool type
The VM disk type for the VM: HDD or SSD.
Enter the number of WVD Session Hosts.
The platform update domain count of avaiability set to be created.
The platform fault domain count of avaiability set to be created.
The name of the Administrator of the new VM and Domain
The password for the Administrator account of the new VM and Domain

Object ID of Group that requires WVD Access
Download Location of Latest Azure AD Connect
Sub DNS Domain Name Example:  sub1. must include a DOT AT END
Sub DNS Domain Name Example:  DC=sub2,DC=sub1, must include COMMA AT END

A new GUID used to identify the role assignment
Session Host OS Version Number (Example:  22000.675.220510, Windows-10=19044.1706.220510)
The location of resources, such as templates and DSC modules, that the template depends on
Auto-generated token to access _artifactsLocation. Leave it blank unless you need to provide your own value.
